title: Second Circle Line track fault causing delays

title_translations.zh-Hans: 环线第二轨道故障导致延误
title_translations.ms: Ralat landasan Laluan Bulatan Kedua menyebabkan kelewatan
title_translations.ta: இரண்டாவது வட்டப் பாதையில் ஏற்பட்ட தடப்பிறழ்வு தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்துகிறது

updates.text: [CCL] CLEARED: Train service is running normally now.

[CCL] Update: Estimate 10mins additional travelling time from #DhobyGhaut to
#Bishan towards #HarbourFront due to track fault.

[CCL] Update: Estimate 15 mins additional travelling time from #DhobyGhaut to
#Bishan towards #HarbourFront due to track fault.

[CCL] Update: Estimate 15mins additional travelling time from #DhobyGhaut to
#Bishan towards #HarbourFront due to track fault.

[CCL] Update: Estimate 10mins additional travelling time from #DhobyGhaut to
#MacPherson towards #HarbourFront due to track fault.
[CCL]: Estimate 5mins additional travelling time from #DhobyGhaut to #MacPherson towards #HarbourFront due to track fault.
